rules_text:
Vigilance
This creature enters with two +1/+1 counters on it if you control a distinguished nonland permanent [i](one that's legendary or has mana value, power, or toughness 5 or greater)[/i] or have cast a distinguished instant or sorcery spell this turn.
flavor_text: [i]“My lord has the knowledge you seek, but I warn you... it may not be what you want to hear.”[/i]
